definitions.definition: An instance of falling short , of not meeting a quota , an obligation , or more generally any expected target .
examples: Due to a shortfall in revenue, we will have to make some cuts.

definitions.definition: The amount by which such a quota, obligation, etc., was missed.

main_definition: An instance of falling short , of not meeting a quota , an obligation , or more generally any expected target .
secondary_definitions: The amount by which such a quota, obligation, etc., was missed.
